overview: Kristin's (Karla Kush) forbidden attraction to her husband's best friend reaches a breaking point when he arranges a private get-together for the two of them. Michelle's (Alison Tyler) husband invites over a handsome coworker to help her find the sexual confidence she lacks outside of their marriage. Passions ignite when Lizzie's (Anikka Albrite) husband hires a masseuse to give her an erotic, anniversary massage. Amy (Chanel Preston) and her husband use a little role-playing to seduce an unsuspecting man into an afternoon of steamy, explosive sex!
title: My Hotwife's Lover
